name: Candlelit - Metroidvania Month 16
description:
Candlelit is the story of an adventurer who has set off to light the ancient candles the once held back the darkness.

Long ago, these Great Candles were watched over the Candle Sages, who were trained from a young age in the Temple. As time passed, the Temple slowly became abandoned, and the ways of the Candle Sages were lost. Thus, the Great Candles slowly went out, one by one, allowing great evil into this world....

Now, it is up to Colabi, a young adventurer, to light the way and save the land from an overwhelming darkness......

Notes:

- Wall-sliding/wall-jumping is enabled

- The player has one double jump and one dash

- Press [E] to interact with things

- Left click to attack

- Space to jump

- Shift to dash

- Esc to pause
